metadata.title: CVE-2016-7142 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The m_sasl module in InspIRCd before 2.0.23, when used with a service that supports SASL_EXTERNAL authentication, allows remote attackers to spoof certificate fingerprints and consequently log in as another user via a crafted SASL message.

criterions.comment: inspircd package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.23-1').
